Recommendations: it is suggested that an improved system be established to make the conduct of extension projects sustainable

establish a clear comprehensive but workable extension project aligned to the program wherein the participation of stakeholders is visible applying the principle of convergence with govemment and nongovernment agencies for project sustainability and impact analyses
if possible scoping process may be incorporated prior to the implementation of extension projects
outreach activities be integrated to ensure continuity and sustainability and for it to be considered as extension program
moaterminal reports should be updated and made available upon completion of the project
